products.model: Apple 13.6' MacBook Air (M2, Midnight) 8GB /256gb) 2019
features: Apple M2 8-Core Chip, 10-core GPU and 16-core Neural Engine

aboutMemory.text: The MacBook Air also got a larger screen. It now features the 13.6' Liquid Retina Display, which has a 2560 x 1664 screen resolution for 224 pixels per inch (ppi). The display has been expanded near the sides and top to make room for the menu bar. This means the MacBook Air now has a larger display with thinner bezels, giving you more screen real estate. The display also features 500 nits of brightness, making it 25 percent brighter than before. Add P3 wide color gamut and the display can support one billion colors for vibrant photos and movies. With True Tone technology, the white balance automatically adjusts to match the color temperature of the light around you for a more natural viewing experience. The MacBook Air is also thinner and lighter, weighing just 2.7 pounds and measuring just 0.44' thin.

products.model: Apple MacBook Pro 16.2' - M1 Pro Chip 16GB 1TB - 2021
features: Apple M1 pro chip with 8-core CPU, 32-core GPU and 16-core Neural Engine
Up to 8TB of superfast SSD storage

aboutMemory.text: With up to 1TB of SSD storage, you'll be able to load massive files and launch apps quickly, enabling you to work with photo and video libraries from almost anywhere. The M1 Pro also features enhanced media engines with dedicated ProRes accelerators specifically for pro video processing. With up to a 16-Core GPU, the M1 Pro delivers up to 70 percent faster CPU performance than the M1.

products.model: Apple 13.3' MacBook Pro M1 Chip 8GB/ 256GB (2020)
features: Apple M1 8-Core CPU and 16-core Neural Engine
P3 Color Gamut - True Tone Technology

aboutMemory.text: The Apple M1 chip redefines the 13-inch MacBook Pro. Featuring an 8-core CPU that flies through complex workflows in photography, coding, video editing, and more. Incredible 8-core GPU that crushes graphics-intensive tasks and enables super-smooth gaming. An advanced 16-core Neural Engine for more machine learning power in your favorite apps. Superfast unified memory for fluid performance. And the longest-ever battery life in a Mac at up to 20 hours.² It’s Apple's most popular pro notebook. Way more performance and way more pro.

products.model: Apple MacBook Pro 13' 32GB RAM 1TB SSD (2020)
features: 2.3GHz quad-core 10th-generation Intel Core i7 processor, Turbo Boost upto 4.1GHz

aboutMemory.text: About Apple MacBook Pro up to 10th-generation processors with up to 80 percent faster graphics performance, Stunning Retina display with True Tone technology, Magic Keyboard, Touch Bar, and Touch ID for a new level of productivity. Performance - Portable powerhouse.MacBook Pro elevates the notebook to a whole new level of performance and portability. Wherever your ideas take you, you'll get there faster than ever with high-performance processors and memory, advanced graphics, blazing-fast storage, and more - all in a compact 3-pound package.

products.model: Apple MacBook Air 15.3' - M2 Chip - 8GB RAM 256GB - 2023

aboutMemory.text: Unlock your true potential with the irresistible MacBook Air 15 M2 Chip. Experience productivity like never before with the supercharged M2 chip delivering lightning-fast speed and up to 18 hours of battery life for seamless multitasking. With its stunning design, vibrant Liquid Retina display and comfortable Backlit Magic Keyboard, the MacBook Air is the epitome of sophistication and performance. Look your best in every video call with the High-Definition camera and immerse yourself in three-dimensional sound from Spatial Audio and Dolby Atmos. Don't settle for ordinary, embrace extraordinary with the all-new MacBook Air!

aboutMemory.text: The system features the Apple M2 Pro 10-Core Chip, which provides the power and performance needed to handle your professional workflows. The 14.2' Liquid Retina XDR display features a 3024 x 1964 resolution, 1000 nits of sustained brightness, 1600 nits of peak brightness, P3 color gamut support, and more. With up 16GB of unified RAM and 512GB of SSD storage, you'll be able to load massive files and launch apps quickly, enabling you to work with photo and video libraries from almost anywhere.

products.model: DELL Chromebook 3400 - 14' - Celeron - 4 GB RAM - 32 GB
features: 3-cell Lithium-Ion Battery with up to 6 hours of use

aboutMemory.text: The Dell Chromebook 3400 is built with the durability to withstand scholastic environments, the Dell 14' 32GB Chromebook 14 3400 is designed for a web-optimized experience. With its user-friendly interface, the Chromebook 14 3400 offers a unique computing experience that is enhanced by the internet, providing professionals with a simple, secure, and easily managed cloud-based experience. The system is powered by a 1.1 GHz Intel Celeron N4000 dual-core processor that can be overclocked to 2.6 GHz. It also has 4GB of 2400 MHz LPDDR4 RAM, 32GB of eMMC storage, Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac), an integrated 720p front-facing webcam, and an integrated microphone.

aboutMemory.text: Unleash your inspiration with 13th Gen Intel® processors that deliver high performance for your creative apps and DDR5 memory that has up to 50% faster clock speed than DDR4 memory. Intel® Arc™ A370M Graphics allow you to import, edit and publish videos in full 8K. Edit videos and export them faster with optional NVIDIA® GeForce RTX ™40 Series Laptop GPUs designed for gamers and creators. Built with the ultra-efficient NVIDIA ®Ada Lovelace architecture, these GPUs bring a quantum leap in performance with AI-powered DLSS 3 and enable lifelike virtual worlds with full ray tracing. Plus, the Max-Q suite of technologies optimizes system performance, power, battery life and acoustics for peak efficiency. XPS 15 is available with up to GeForce RTX™ 4070 Laptop GPU.

aboutMemory.text: With the EliteBook 840, you can work in style. The full aluminum exterior presents a minimalist silver finish accompanied by HP's stylish slash logo. There's a lightly engraved EliteBook logo on the hinge, and toward the top of the lid is a gray line dividing the lip of the laptop. I love that the hinge is at an angle, giving the notebook some flair compared to the plain, rectangular chassis of many other business laptops. The design is quite neat and simple.

aboutMemory.text: This computer comes with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD. The Intel Core i5-11400H is a high-end hexa-core SoC for gaming laptops and mobile workstations. It is based on the Tiger Lake H45 generation and was announced in mid 2021. It integrates six Willow Cove processor cores (12 threads thanks to HyperThreading). The base clock speed depends on the TDP setting and at 45 Watt is at 2.7 GHz. The single core boost speed can reach up to 4.5 GHz, all cores can reach up to 4.1 GHz. The CPU geatures 12 MB L3 cache and supports DDR4-3200 memory.
